# iosxr_snmp_server_mib (Data Source)

This data source can read the SNMP Server MIB configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_snmp_server_mib" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `cbqosmib_cache` (Boolean) Enable CBQoSMIB stats data caching
- `cbqosmib_cache_refresh_time` (Number) Cache refresh time in seconds
- `cbqosmib_cache_service_policy_count` (Number) Number of service-policy stats
- `cbqosmib_member_stats` (Boolean) Enable bundle member interface statistics retrieval
- `cbqosmib_persist` (Boolean) Persist CBQoSMIB config, service-policy and object indices
- `cmplsteextmib_cache_timer` (Number) Modify MIB chache timer
- `cmplsteextstdmib_cache_timer` (Number) Modify MIB chache timer
- `entityindex_persist` (Boolean) Persist indices
- `frrmib_cache_timer` (Number) Modify MIB chache timer
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `ifindex_persist` (Boolean) Persist interface indices
- `ifmib_ifalias_long` (Boolean) Enable support for ifAlias values longer than 64 characters
- `ifmib_internal_cache_max_duration` (Number) Change the max duration
- `ifmib_ipsubscriber` (Boolean) Enable ipsubscriber interfaces in IFMIB
- `ifmib_stats_cache` (Boolean) Get cached interface statistics
- `interfaces` (Attributes List) Interface to configure (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces))
- `mplsp2mpmib_cache_timer` (Number) Modify MIB cache timer
- `mplstemib_cache_timers_garbage_collect` (Number) Modify MIB cache garbage collect timer
- `mplstemib_cache_timers_refresh` (Number) Modify MIB cache refresh timer
- `mroutemib_send_all_vrf` (Boolean) enable sending all vrf interface info for cIpMRouteInterfaceTable
- `notification_log_mib_default` (Boolean) To create a default log
- `notification_log_mib_disable` (Boolean) disable, to disable the logging in default log
- `notification_log_mib_global_age_out` (Number) GlobalAgeOut is the minutes associated with the mib
- `notification_log_mib_global_size` (Number) GlobalSize, max number of notifications that can be logged in all logs
- `notification_log_mib_size` (Number) size, The max number of notifications that this log (default) can hold
- `rfmib_entphyindex` (Boolean) Enable Entity Physical Index as cRFStatusUnitId and cRFStatusPeerUnitId
- `sensormib_cache` (Boolean) Enables sensormib caching
- `trap_link_ietf` (Boolean) Set the varbind of linkupdown trap to the RFC specified varbinds (default cisco)

<a id="nestedatt--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces`

Read-Only:

- `index_persistence` (Boolean) Persistency across system reloads
- `interface_name` (String) Interface to configure
- `notification_linkupdown_disable` (Boolean) Disable linkUp and linkDown notification
- `notification_linkupdown_enable` (Boolean) Disable linkUp and linkDown notification
